We always knew the CEO's corner office at Googleplex was no place for an acerbic wit like Eric Schmidt 's. Say something like The Google policy on a lot of things is to get right up to the creepy line and not cross it. I would argue that implanting something in your brain is beyond the creepy line- at least for the moment, until the technology gets better onstage during a product demo, and you're a PR nightmare. . Eric Schmidt is now executive chairman, focusing on external relationships like deals, partnerships and nipping out on sandwich runs. Eric Schmidt said Google is growing by 20 per cent around the world, but added, We don't have to do everything. Which is news to those worried that the Big G is taking over the world one email address at a time. Do you think Facebook and other closed networks should make your information available through Google?

Mike Pence shuts 1 door, leaves another open U.S. Rep. Mike Pence shut the door Thursday on seeking the presidency in 2012 but left unanswered whether his choice instead is the Indiana governor's office. I'm open to running for governor, Mike Pence said in an exclusive interview with The Indianapolis Star.`` We're going to take the next several months to travel across the state and hear what Hoosiers have to say. We'll seriously consider it.
